mapper.update: update final_member SET mem_name= #{mem_name}, mem_birth = #{mem_birth}, mem_email = #{mem_email} WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: select * from final_member m, final_photo p where m.mem_id = p.ph_id(+) and m.mem_id = #{_parameter}
select rownum rno, qna_id as no, qna_subject as subject, qna_content as content from store_qna where qna_id like '%${findStr}%' or QNA_SUBJECT like '%${findStr}%'
select count(qna_id) as count from store_qna where qna_id like '%${findStr}%' or QNA_SUBJECT like '%${findStr}%'

select j3.product_cate, sum(j2.cart_count) as count from STORE_ORDER j1 join ORDER_DETAILS j2 on j1.order_serial = j2.order_serial join product j3 on j3.product_id = j2.product_id where order_state = 1 group by j3.product_cate order by sum(j2.cart_count) desc

select age , count(*) as count from ( select floor((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - substr(mem_birth,1,4)) / 10) * 10 as age from FINAL_MEMBER where floor((to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY') - substr(mem_birth,1,4)) / 10) * 10 BETWEEN 0 and 100 ) o group by age order by age

select rownum rank, b.* from( select ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by j4.product_id order by ph.photo_serial asc) as rnum ,count, j4.product_id, ph.sysfile, j4.product_name,j4.product_price from ( select sum(cart_count) as count, j1.product_id from ORDER_DETAILS j1 join STORE_ORDER j2 on j1.order_serial = j2.order_serial where order_state = 1 GROUP by product_id ) a join product j4 on a.product_id = j4.product_id join product_photo ph on ph.product_id = j4.product_id order by count desc) b where rnum=1
SELECT sum(amount) as amount, to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm') as order_date FROM store_order where ORDER_STATE = 1 group by to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm') order by order_date

select rownum rno, a. * from(SELECT row_number() over(PARTITION by j2.product_id order by j4.photo_serial asc ) as rnum, j1.order_serial, j1.mem_id, j1.get_name, j1.get_phone, j1.order_state, j1.zip_code, j1.address1, j1.address2, j1.amount, j1.order_date, j2.orderdetails_serial, j2.product_id, j2.cart_count,j3.product_name, j3.product_price, j3.product_size, j4.sysfile FROM ( store_order j1 INNER JOIN order_details j2 ON j1.order_serial = j2.order_serial ) inner join product j3 on j2.product_id = j3.product_id inner join product_photo j4 on j3.product_id = j4.product_id WHERE j1.mem_id = #{mem_id} and j1.order_serial = #{order_serial} )a where rnum=1
select count(order_serial) from store_order where mem_id like '%${findStr}%'
select order_serial, mem_id, get_name, get_phone, zip_code, address1, address2, amount, order_date, order_state from store_order where mem_id like '%${findStr}%' order by ORDER_SERIAL desc

select r1.review_id,mem_id, r3.product_name,r3.product_id, rsubject, rcontent, review_like, review_date, review_pid, image1, image2 from review r1 left outer join REVIEW_PHOTO r2 on r1.review_id = r2.review_id join product r3 on r3.product_id = r1.product_id where r1.review_id = ${_parameter}

select * from (select rownum rno, a.* from (select row_number() over(partition by r.REVIEW_ID order by review_pid asc) as rnum, r.review_Id ,mem_id, p.PRODUCT_ID,RSUBJECT,RCONTENT,REVIEW_LIKE,REVIEW_DATE, review_pid, image1, image2, rp_date, product_name FROM review r left outer join review_photo rp ON r.review_id = rp.review_id inner join product p on p.product_id = r.product_id where mem_id like '%${findStr}%' or product_name like '%${findStr}%' order by r.review_id desc)a where rnum=1) where rno BETWEEN ${startNo} and ${endNo}
SELECT count(review_id) FROM review j1 join product j2 ON j1.product_id = j2.product_id WHERE mem_id like '%${findStr}%' or product_name like '%${findStr}%'
mapper.insert: insert into product_photo(photo_serial, product_id, orifile, sysfile) values(seq_productAtt.nextval, ${product_id}, #{orifile}, #{sysfile})
insert into product_photo(photo_serial, product_id, orifile, sysfile) values(seq_productAtt.nextval, seq_product.currval, #{orifile}, #{sysfile})
mapper.select: select count(product_id) from product where product_name like '%${findStr}%'

select * from (select rownum rno, a.* from(select ROW_NUMBER() over(partition by p.product_id order by photo_serial asc) as rnum, p.product_id, product_name, product_explain, product_price, product_cate, product_count, product_size, photo_serial,orifile,sysfile from product p left outer join product_photo ph on p.product_id = ph.product_id where product_name like '%${findStr}%' order by p.product_id desc)a where rnum=1)where rno between ${startNo} and ${endNo}

select p.product_id, product_name, product_explain, PRODUCT_PRICE, product_cate,product_count, product_size, photo_serial, orifile, sysfile FROM product p left outer join product_photo ph on p.product_id = ph.product_id where p.product_id=${_parameter}
